declarations.description:
<pds-form>

Form Actions:
By default, the form includes Submit and Reset buttons inside the <form> element.

Usage options:
1. Default buttons:
   <pds-form .jsonSchema=${schema}></pds-form>

2. Customize labels:
   <pds-form .jsonSchema=${schema} submit-label="Save" reset-label="Clear"></pds-form>

3. Hide reset button:
   <pds-form .jsonSchema=${schema} hide-reset></pds-form>

4. Add extra buttons (slot):
   <pds-form .jsonSchema=${schema}>
     <button type="button" slot="actions"
declarations.name: SchemaForm

members.description: Toggles the visibility of the primary panel in mobile view.

attributes.name: layout
attributes.description: The layout direction of the panels. Can be "horizontal" or "vertical". Defaults to "horizontal".

attributes.name: defaultsplit
attributes.description: The initial size of the primary (left/top) panel. Defaults to "450px".

attributes.name: breakpoint
attributes.description: The viewport width in pixels below which the component switches to mobile view. Defaults to 1024.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Controls the visibility of the primary panel in mobile view.

declarations.description:
A tab panel used as a child of `<pds-tabstrip>`. Each panel becomes a tab
with its button label derived from the `label` attribute.
declarations.name: TabPanel

slots.description: Content displayed when this tab is active

members.name: section
members.description: The inner `<section>` that exposes the panel region semantics.

attributes.description: Label text displayed on the tab button
attributes.name: label

attributes.description: Unique identifier for the panel (auto-generated if not provided)
attributes.name: id

declarations.description:
Tab navigation component that displays content in switchable panels.

Use `<pds-tabpanel>` children with a `label` attribute to define each tab.
The component auto-generates navigation buttons and handles URL hash synchronization.
declarations.name: TabStrip

cssProperties.description: Color of the active tab indicator underline
cssProperties.name: --color-accent-400

cssParts.description: Navigation container comprising the clickable tab buttons
cssParts.name: tabs

slots.description: One or more `<pds-tabpanel>` elements, each with a `label` attribute

events.description: Fired when the active tab changes. Detail: `{ oldTab: string|null, newTab: string }`

attributes.description: Accessible label announced for the tablist (default: "Tabs")
attributes.name: label

attributes.description: Identifier of the currently active panel (synced with the location hash)
attributes.name: selected

   * @param {boolean} [options.persistent=false] - If true, toast doesn't auto-dismiss
   *
